description:
Collecting km’s this winter? These breathable soft shell pants keep the cold at bay and shed light precip. Elastic fabric and articulated knees allow easy movement. Mesh panels behind the knees provide ventilation so you can increase the tempo.

  • Water and wind resistant soft shell with Bionic Finish Eco® (a natural fluorine – free hydrophobic finish)
  • Elastic fabric, stretch seams, articulated legs and gusseted crotch add ease of movement
  • Mesh ventilation panels behind knees for breathability
  • Elastic waistband (with drawstring)
  • Front pocket with YKK® zipper
  • Reflective details for enhanced visibility in low light
  • YKK ¾-zipper on lower legs for use over your ski boots
  • Cuffs with silicone grip to keep everything in place
name: B Daehlie Pro Pants - Men's
